actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Education and the Workforce.

actions.in_committee: House Committee on Education and the Workforce
actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Early Childhood, Youth and Families.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Early Childhood, Youth and Families

official_title: To amend the Child Nutrition Act of 1966 to prohibit the donation of competitive foods of minimal nutritional value in schools participating in Federal meal service programs before the end of the last lunch period of the schools.
short_title: Better Nutrition for School Children Act of 1999

summary.text: Better Nutrition for School Children Act of 1999 - Amends the Child Nutrition Act of 1966 (CNA) to prohibit the donation or service without charge of competitive foods of minimal nutritional value before the end of the last lunch period in schools participating in Federal meal service programs under CNA and the National School Lunch Act.

titles.title: Better Nutrition for School Children Act of 1999

To amend the Child Nutrition Act of 1966 to prohibit the donation of competitive foods of minimal nutritional value in schools participating in Federal meal service programs before the end of the last lunch period of the schools.
